main event: The witness reported seeing 3 or 5 bright white lights in the sky that rotated around a center light, moving at a fairly rapid rate across the sky.
interesting points: The object was described as a low-flying, round, white object that made no noise.
The object appeared to be very close, low in the sky, and larger than an average aircraft.
The witness had seen similar reddish-white shiny metal objects in the past for a long time.
The witness was a 13-year-old male who reported the sighting to someone on 1/7/year.
The witness provided a simple sketch showing the object's motion and arrangement.
sighted object: 3 or 5 bright white lights rotating around a center light
